title: Fans slam Stephen Bear for walking out on his date | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share 'I would cry if a bloke ran away from a date with me,' one wrote. 'Catching up on #CelebsGoDating that bear bloke is NOT funny, he's so rude!!!!' Stephen incensed viewers by flirting heavily with the mystery lady before making an excuse to go to the toilet, grabbing his coat as he went. High and dry: His date remained solo in the restaurant, believing her date was in the toilet Unimpressed: One fan described Bear as 'NOT funny and rude' I'll get my coat: Stephen incensed viewers by flirting heavily with the mystery lady before making an excuse to go to the toilet, grabbing his coat as he went. 'I can't lie... she's nothing like I was expecting,' he later explained before ditching the beauty in the restaurant with no explanation. 'OMG cant believe @stephen_bear just did a runner from his date,' one viewer tweeted. 'He could of at least paid for the bread he ordered.' 'Why is IT given airtime ? Not funny or entertaining,' another added. I''m sorry like but a don't see how anyone could be attracted to someone so shallow and just awful. Bear's awful.' 'Not funny or entertaining': Fans questioned why the reality star was 'given airtime' Shallow and awful: Fans suggested Bear should be kicked off the show Others insisted he should be kicked off the show. 'No respect for anyone,' one fan wrote, while another added: The only bellend bigger than Bear is Trump....what an actual k***head #luckyescape. Not all were against the CBB star though with one supportive fan adding: 'Dunno why everyone is hating on bear.. that's what's he's like we all saw him on #cbb that girl catfish even said she knew. 'Haha I actually can't help it i just love @stephen_bear he's hilarious...' another added. Outrage: Not all viewers were against Bear, with one describing him as 'hilarious' Meanwhile, Stephen's alleged love Charlotte Crosby also reacted on Twitter to his appearance, sending a cryptic tweet about being in pain. The 26-year-old former Geordie Shore star is said to be hooking up with the CBB winner, 27, whose widely-anticipated appearance on the pre-recorded show was reported to have been cut short amid rumours of their romance. While Twitter was flooded with disgruntled viewers, the move appeared to irk Charlotte as she took to the microblogging site to pen: 'I'm just a sucker for pain, what can I say'. Having now made his name as a prankster, who takes very little seriously, Bear then responded by penning a sarcastic response saying: 'Cool Story', after which Charlotte replied: 'H very interesting'.
